OrgName: Ortho Clinical Diagnostics., and its U.S. subsidiary, Micro Typing Systems
activities:
Ortho Clinical Diagnostics, and its US subsidiaries, including Micro Typing Systems, receives personal information about:
•	research subjects, patients, investigators and staff, service providers and business partners, and health care professionals, all in support of clinical research operations
•	personnel, including prospective and former employees to carry out the company’s human resources functions
•	health care professionals and patients to carry out the company’s complaint handling legal obligations 
•	individuals, including health care professionals, in connection with marketing activities.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical Research, Human Resources, Complaint Handling, Marketing
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) Panel and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR data and JAMS for all other Data Types.
